Uses of Interface
net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.PublishOption

  • Packages that use PublishOption 
    Package Description
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker
    Top level package for the information broker.
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish
    Options to publish().
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.util
    Utils for various InformationBroker classes and objects.

    • Uses of PublishOption in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker

      Methods in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker with parameters of type PublishOption 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void InformationBroker.publish(java.lang.Class<? extends InformationItem<T>> channel, T item, PublishOption... options)
      Publishes a new information item.

    • Uses of PublishOption in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish

      Classes in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish that implement PublishOption 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OptionSilentPublish
      Requests the InformationBroker to publish() to update the item silently, i.e., without calling any registered subscriber.

      For example, to update a value silently, you could write:

      informationBroker.publish(item, new OptionSilentPublish());

    • Uses of PublishOption in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.util
